detail_desc: Lace suspender belt to hold nylon stockings up with elastic at the top and an adjustable fastening at the back.
Pyjama bottoms in soft flannel made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and wide, gently tapered legs.
Pyjamas with a T-shirt and shorts in cotton jersey. T-shirt with a motif on the chest. Patterned shorts with an elasticated waist, side pockets and fake fly.
Satin tie. Width 6.5 cm.
Top in sturdy sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood with a wrapover front. Long, raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length treggings in cotton sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with a ribbed, easy pull-on, elasticated waist. Fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Calf-length, flared skirt in sturdy, heavily draping jersey with an elasticated waist and slits in the sides. Lined.
Bomber jacket in a washed cotton weave with a zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and welt side pockets with a concealed press-stud. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Unlined.
Playsuit in sequined, glittery jersey with spaghetti shoulder straps. V-neck at the front, straight cut at the back, a gathered seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Tights in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved cotton jersey tops in various designs.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Shorts in airy cotton seersucker with diagonal side pockets and elastication, a small frill trim and decorative, tasselled bow at the waist.
Fully lined tie tanga Brazilian bikini bottoms with a mid waist, ties at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Cargo shorts in cotton twill with a regular waist, and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, leg pockets with a flap and button and slim legs.
Scarf in woven fabric with a sheen, decorated with beads and sparkly stones in one corner. Size 68x180 cm.
Set with 20 narrow hair elastics and 6 metal hair clips. Length of hair clips 4 cm.
Jumper in soft, airy, slub-knit wool. High collar with overlocked edges, extra-long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Set with a top and skirt in soft jersey. Short-sleeved top with a print motif on the front. Skirt with asymmetric flounces and a glittery elastic waistband.
Calf-length dress in soft, stretch jersey made from recycled polyester. Smocked bodice, long, wide sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a wide skirt. Unlined.
Chino shorts in a washed cotton weave with a zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket and welt back pockets. Regular fit.

V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Sewn-in wrapover front, a gathered, overlocked frill trim around the neckline and waist, and long puff sleeves with gathers to the cuffs. Seam at the waist with narrow, covered elastication and a gently flared peplum.
Body in lace and mesh with a V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lined, triangle cups. Elasticated seam under the bust and at the waist, and a lined gusset.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with frayed hems.
Swimsuit with crossover frills at the front that continue back over the shoulders. Lined gusset.
Cap in soft, marled cotton jersey with a raised print on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

Jumpsuit in a viscose weave with a flounce at the top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with narrow elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with gathered hems. Unlined.

Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Zipped side pockets and an adjustable hook and loop fastening and fleece inner ribbing at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in velvet made from a silk blend with a round neckline and an opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Padded shoulders, long sleeves and wide satin cuffs with a slit and button. Lined.
Low ankle boots in suede with pointed toes and block heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 5.5 cm.
Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with a wrapover and cut-out section at the back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fabric cap with an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Thong briefs in cotton jersey with a wide lace trim at the top. Low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and a string back.
Thin metal rings in various sizes that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.

Ankle-length trousers in stretch cotton twill with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets with a flap and button, flap back pockets and straight legs with creases.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, frill trim, ties at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Long-sleeved top in supersoft sweatshirt fabric with a brushed finish. Deep V-neck and a sewn-in wrapover at the front.

Dress in cotton seersucker with a stand-up collar with buttons at the top and a sewn-in wrapover at the front. Short puff sleeves with a button at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined.
5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in soft superstretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and sequins front and back.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a motif on the front.
Pyjamas in soft velour. Long-sleeved top with an appliqué on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed cotton denim with a high waist and zip fly and button.

Short-sleeved blouse in an airy weave with a unique nursing feature. Round neck, opening and button at the back of the neck and a frilled seam at the waist. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Waist bag with a zip at the front and an adjustable waist strap with a plastic buckle. Size 7x16x30 cm.
Leggings in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Two-button jacket in a slub-weave linen and wool blend with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Chest pocket, welt front pockets with a flap and three inner pockets, one with a button. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.

Short, wide dress in an airy silk and cotton weave with a small stand-up collar with narrow ties and an opening at the top. Low dropped shoulders, wide sleeves and wide cuffs with decorative stitching and adjustable buttoning. Gathers at the top to create soft draping. Unlined.
Tunic in a crinkled cotton weave with embroidery. V-neck with ties at the neckline, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey.

Dress in a patterned viscose weave with a round neckline and an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with lace trims, elasticated cuffs, a gathered seam at the hips and a gently flared skirt.
Long-sleeved blouse in a softly draping weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Slightly wider sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless top in ribbed jersey with a high, ribbed collar and a zip at the top with a ring pull.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed style with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.
Satin loafers with a grosgrain trim around the top, satin linings and insoles and rubber soles.
5-pocket shorts in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and detachable, elastic braces.
Short dress in a viscose weave with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, a V-neck with ties at the front, and a gathered seam at the waist. Unlined.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Short, A-line skirt with buttons down the front.
Padded gilet with a detachable, lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt side pockets. Lined.
Wide headband in soft, rib-knit cashmere with a decorative knot at the front.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Short skirt in velour with a sheen. High waist with elastication at the back and a sewn-in, frill-trimmed wrapover at the front. Unlined.
Sleeveless dress in airy cotton seersucker with elastication at the top, narrow, double shoulder straps and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Fully lined, 5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Blouse in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a gathered yoke at the back. long sleeves with buttoned cuffs,and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in stretch denim with elastication and a press-stud at the waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif and a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Frilled blouse in plumeti chiffon with a small stand-up collar, partially concealed buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy, block-coloured cotton jersey. Panel with a text print down the sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with a gathered grandad collar, buttons down the front and long raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Long poncho in patterned chiffon with open sides with a button at each side.

Long shirt jacket in a wool blend with a soft, brushed finish. Collar, buttons down the front, a yoke with a pleat at the back and flap chest and front pockets. Dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Unlined. The wool content of the jacket is recycled.
Sleeveless top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a gathered, elasticated frill around the neckline and armholes.
